name: The Story Of The Small Village
name_original: The Story Of The Small Village
description:
My game for my first ludum dare and first solo game jam.

Base

In this game you have to chose on 2 mini game for build your village with a house, inn, marker and wellbore.

Story

You are the new owner of this land, and you want to build a village on it. But for that some trials await you... not too complicated tests, though.

Control

Use : mouse, spacebar, enter and the arrows.
